subject: Olympic Games
Track and Field
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Mennea, who won a gold medal in the 200 meters at the 1980 Moscow Olympics, held the world record in the event from 1979 to 1996.
snippet: Mr. Mennea, who won a gold medal in the 200 meters at the 1980 Moscow Olympics, held the world record in the event from 1979 to 1996.
